verses.verse: And<WG2532> I saw<WG1492> another<WG243> mighty<WG2478> angel<WG32> come down<WG2597> from<WG1537> heaven<WG3772>, clothed<WG4016> with a cloud<WG3507>: and<WG2532> a rainbow<WG2463> was upon<WG1909> his<WG846> head<WG2776>, and<WG2532> his<WG846> face<WG4383> was as it were<WG5613> the sun<WG2246>, and<WG2532> his<WG846> feet<WG4228> as<WG5613> pillars<WG4769> of fire<WG4442>:

And<WG2532> he had<WG2192> in<WG1722> his<WG846> hand<WG5495> a little book<WG974> open<WG455>: and<WG2532> he set<WG5087> his<WG846> right<WG1188> foot<WG4228> upon<WG1909> the sea<WG2281>, and<WG1161> his left<WG2176> foot on<WG1909> the earth<WG1093>,

And<WG2532> cried<WG2896> with a loud<WG3173> voice<WG5456>, as<WG5618> when a lion<WG3023> roareth<WG3455>: and<WG2532> when<WG3753> he had cried<WG2896>, seven<WG2033> thunders<WG1027> uttered<WG2980> their<WG1438> voices<WG5456>.

And<WG2532> when<WG3753> the seven<WG2033> thunders<WG1027> had uttered<WG2980> their<WG1438> voices<WG5456>, I was about<WG3195> to write<WG1125>: and<WG2532> I heard<WG191> a voice<WG5456> from<WG1537> heaven<WG3772> saying<WG3004> unto me<WG3427>, Seal up<WG4972> those things which<WG3739> the seven<WG2033> thunders<WG1027> uttered<WG2980>, and<WG2532> write<WG1125> them<WG5023> not<WG3361>.

And<WG2532> the angel<WG32> which<WG3739> I saw<WG1492> stand<WG2476> upon<WG1909> the sea<WG2281> and<WG2532> upon<WG1909> the earth<WG1093> lifted up<WG142> his<WG846> hand<WG5495> to<WG1519> heaven<WG3772>,

And<WG2532> sware<WG3660> by<WG1722> him that liveth<WG2198> for<WG1519> ever<WG165> and ever<WG165>, who<WG3739> created<WG2936> heaven<WG3772>, and<WG2532> the things that therein are<WG1722> <WG846>, and<WG2532> the earth<WG1093>, and<WG2532> the things that therein are<WG1722> <WG846>, and<WG2532> the sea<WG2281>, and<WG2532> the things which are therein<WG1722> <WG846>, that<WG3754> there should be<WG2071> time<WG5550> no<WG3756> longer<WG2089>:

But<WG235> in<WG1722> the days<WG2250> of the voice<WG5456> of the seventh<WG1442> angel<WG32>, when<WG3752> he shall begin<WG3195> to sound<WG4537>,<WG2532> the mystery<WG3466> of God<WG2316> should be finished<WG5055>, as<WG5613> he hath declared<WG2097> to his<WG1438> servants<WG1401> the prophets<WG4396>.

And<WG2532> the voice<WG5456> which<WG3739> I heard<WG191> from<WG1537> heaven<WG3772> spake<WG2980> unto<WG3326> me<WG1700> again<WG3825>, and<WG2532> said<WG3004>, Go<WG5217> and take<WG2983> the little book<WG974> which<WG3588> is open<WG455> in<WG1722> the hand<WG5495> of the angel<WG32> which<WG3588> standeth<WG2476> upon<WG1909> the sea<WG2281> and<WG2532> upon<WG1909> the earth<WG1093>.

And<WG2532> I went<WG565> unto<WG4314> the angel<WG32>, and said<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Give<WG1325> me<WG3427> the little book<WG974>. And<WG2532> he said<WG3004> unto me<WG3427>, Take<WG2983> it, and<WG2532> eat<WG2719> it<WG846> up<WG2719>; and it<WG2532> shall make<WG4087> thy<WG4675> belly<WG2836> bitter<WG4087>, but<WG235> it shall be<WG2071> in<WG1722> thy<WG4675> mouth<WG4750> sweet<WG1099> as<WG5613> honey<WG3192>.

And<WG2532> I took<WG2983> the little book<WG974> out of<WG1537> the angel's<WG32> hand<WG5495>, and<WG2532> ate<WG2719> it<WG846> up<WG2719>; and<WG2532> it was<WG2258> in<WG1722> my<WG3450> mouth<WG4750> sweet<WG1099> as<WG5613> honey<WG3192>: and<WG2532> as soon as<WG3753> I had eaten<WG5315> it<WG846>, my<WG3450> belly<WG2836> was bitter<WG4087>.

And<WG2532> he said<WG3004> unto me<WG3427>, Thou<WG4571> must<WG1163> prophesy<WG4395> again<WG3825> before<WG1909> many<WG4183> peoples<WG2992>, and<WG2532> nations<WG1484>, and<WG2532> tongues<WG1100>, and<WG2532> kings<WG935>.
